name: Techoyaki - Dawn - BETA TEST
description:
Good Day everyone!! We are group TECHOYAKI, A 4th-year students from FEU Institute of Technology studying under BSIT Specialized in Animation and Game Development. Our group is currently making A capstone project entitled DAWN-A 3D IMMERSIVE FIRST-PERSON SURVIVAL-SUSPENSE, PUZZLE GAME FOR COGNITIVE SKILLS DEVELOPMENT. 

This project aims to enhance the player’s cognitive abilities and make a game withn interesting story, numerous puzzles, and a large building to explore that will entertain casual and seasoned gamers.

Our game is still in development. Players can access the 5th floor and 4th floors. The game is consist of Puzzles, a large building to explore,  the Main menu, Enemy AI, sound effects, and background music.

After the game testing, your comments and evaluation will be greatly valued.
The Google Forms Link is provided here.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdnVZ4APzq1xnb15j_HokpN9s2MHAC4iEQoHESG...

-Techoyaki
